name: Suitcase Shuttle
description:
Pack your things and go explore the universe. 

- Drag and drop the items you wish to bring with you to the next planet. 

- Rotate with spacebar, tab or leftclick. 

Try to have a balanced life. 

Settle whenever the planet you are on makes you feel good.

Credits: Art - Geneviève Bachand / Programming - Colin Towle / UI/UX - Kamylle
